title: Episode #1.3
description: The families are introduced to Peter Campbell, Burt's son from his first marriage; the Godfather offers Danny a contract to leave the mob, by killing his own stepfather Burt.

title: Episode #1.4
description: NFL quarterback Dennis Phillips turns out to be Jodie's boyfriend; Danny makes several hilarious attempts on Burt's life, while the oblivious victim is happily making a sandwich.

title: Episode #1.5
description: Corinne reveals her feelings for Catholic priest Father Timothy Flotsky, but still decides to move in with Burt's son Peter; Burt cannot reveal his secret to a sex psychiatrist, who admits to his own troubles from a Playboy bunny.

title: Episode #1.6
description: Father Tim has to raise his voice in church to drown out Corinne's pleas; Jessica blames Chester for her affair with Peter, as he was the one who bought her a tennis racket for her birthday.

title: Episode #1.7
description: Chuck and Bob arrive from Hawaii, insulting everyone within earshot; Chester's secretary Claire reveals all to Jessica, who believes only that the poor girl is delusional about having an affair with her husband; on a fishing trip with Danny at a secluded cabin, Burt goes from jubilant to nervous as his stepson reveals his intent to kill him.

title: Episode #1.8
description: Unable to kill his stepfather Burt, Danny must now hide out from the mob, telling his mother that he's been chosen to work undercover as a spy.

title: Episode #1.9
description: Awaiting his sex change operation, Jodie befriends an elderly Jew named Barney Gerber, and a pretty nurse who jumps at the chance to 'convert' a homosexual; Burt tells Dr. Medlow how he killed Mary's first husband in self defense, and is assured that it was not premeditated.

title: Episode #1.10
description: An ecstatic Burt returns home ready to celebrate after six months of celibacy, but a distraught Mary is unable to reciprocate; devastated at losing Dennis to a woman, Jodie swallows 45 pills in a desperate suicide attempt, tearfully slipping away as Barney Gerber displays his joy for life.

title: Episode #1.11
description: Barney Gerber reassures Burt and Mary that Jodie is doing fine, while Jessica confesses her affair with Peter to her husband Chester, who only feels amusement at her unfaithfulness.

title: Episode #1.12
description: Jessica delivers an ultimatum to the philandering Chester, and threatens to kill Peter Campbell for lying to her and betraying her daughter Corinne; late that night, while in the shower, Peter is murdered by an unseen assailant.

title: Episode #1.13
description: In the aftermath of Peter's murder, Chief of Police Tinkler goes over the facts with both the Tates and the Campbells.

title: Episode #1.14
description: In the aftermath of Peter's murder, the Tates and Campbells take turns suspecting each other; Chief of Police Tinkler arrives to make an arrest- Corinne.

title: Episode #1.15
description: Corrine's natural mother, formerly the Tates' Swedish maid, travels to Dunn's River to be with her daughter; tiring of running from the mob, Danny winds up in bed with the daughter of mob boss Mr. Lefkowitz.

title: Episode #1.16
description: Corinne meets her real mother, Ingrid Svenson, for the very first time; still vengeful at the loss of her child, Ingrid has hired a German detective whose abrasive nature rubs Benson the wrong way; and Chief of Police Tinkler gathers enough evidence to arrest Jessica for Peter's murder.

title: Episode #1.17
description: Chester has to mortgage the house to make Jessica's bail; Burt claims he can make himself invisible.

title: Episode #1.18
description: Chester enlists on Jessica's behalf E. Ronald Mallu, the most expensive attorney money can buy; Chester's spiteful secretary Claire finally makes good on her threats by turning him in to the SEC.

title: Episode #1.19
description: E. Ronald Mallu struggles to find good character witnesses for Jessica among her crazy family; Jessica's heartfelt pleas to Corinne are shot down by the bitter Ingrid Svenson, who convinces Corinne that she only did it to prevent her testifying against her mother in court.

title: Episode #1.20
description: Exhausted by Elaine's affections, Danny is stunned to learn that he must marry her or have his brains blown out; Jodie hides Bob in the refrigerator, only to learn that Chuck cannot carry on a conversation without another identity.

title: Episode #1.21
description: Jessica's trial begins, with the prosecutor saying such nasty things about her that she threatens not to come back; Jodie meets Carol David, E. Ronald Mallu's assistant, who finds the 'suicidal homosexual' adorable.

title: Episode #1.22
description: While dining at a Japanese restaurant, Carol convinces Jodie to go away with her for a weekend; Jessica's trial continues, with the prosecutor announcing a surprise witness.

title: Episode #1.23
description: Burt finally tells Mary how he killed her first husband; Ingrid loses Corinne after sleeping with Judge Petrillo; and Tim's mother can't suppress the desire to strangle Corinne, the girl who stole her son away from the priesthood.

title: Episode #1.24
description: Jodie wakes up in bed with Carol, understandably confused about the previous night's events; Chief of Police Tinkler drops by to arrest Chester for his stock manipulations; E. Ronald Mallu's summation brings Jessica's trial to a close.

title: Episode #1.25
description: Tim and Corinne plan their wedding; Carol convinces Jodie that they should live together; and the jury returns a verdict in Jessica's trial- guilty.

title: Episode #2.1
description: Chester saves Jessica by confessing to Peter's murder, winding up in a cell with convicted killer Dutch Lightner; Carol cannot bring herself to tell Jodie he's going to be a father.

title: Episode #2.2
description: Danny marries Elaine; Jodie returns home from a date with Dennis to hear Carol reveal that she's pregnant; Dutch and Chester escape from prison and hide out in the Tate cellar.

title: Episode #2.3
description: Dutch and Eunice spend the night together; Tim's mother makes an unexpected appearance at his wedding to Corinne; Mary's problems just can't seem to top Jessica's.

title: Episode #2.4
description: Just as Corinne works her charms on her new husband, Tim's vengeful mother interrupts the honeymoon to inquire if the bride is there; Danny tries to curb his wife's expensive tastes by killing her with kindness; Mary decides to go to college; and Chester's birthday celebration abruptly ends when he suffers another blackout.

title: Episode #2.5
description: Chester's doctor reveals how he was able to commit murder, requiring a delicate brain operation; Danny refuses to allow Elaine to eat or sleep because nothing is good enough for her; and Tim's mother has the temerity to place a curse upon her 'fallen priest' son with her dying breath.

title: Episode #2.6
description: Jodie tells Dennis about his impending marriage to Carol; Mary convinces Danny to try being nice to Elaine; no one is more surprised than the doctor to find that Chester survived the operation.

title: Episode #2.7
description: Carol introduces Jodie to her overprotective father; Elaine confesses her love to Danny; Burt's secretary Sally reveals her love for him.

title: Episode #2.8
description: The amnesiac Chester returns home; Eunice wants to join Dutch at his grandmother's farm; Corinne reveals that she's pregnant; and Burt spies his wife on the couch with her English professor, reaches the wrong conclusion, then spends the night in bed with Sally.

title: Episode #2.9
description: Burt has to concoct a wild story to explain to Mary why he failed to come home the night before; Jessica confides that Chester may have started cheating on her on their wedding night, which explains how the chambermaid's underwear got into her suitcase.

title: Episode #2.10
description: Dutch tells Jessica how he killed an extortionist in self defense; an amnesiac Chester has vanished; and Elaine's loving new relationship with her husband is interrupted when she gets kidnapped by two masked men.

title: Episode #2.11
description: Detective Donohue is hired to find the missing Chester; Corinne learns that she's five months pregnant, yet only married a month; Jodie directs a TV commercial featuring Mr. Peppy Flake and Rodney Raisin; and Elaine's kidnappers demand a huge ransom for her safe return.

title: Episode #2.12
description: Danny negotiates with Elaine's kidnappers; Detective Donohue confesses his love for Jessica; and Jodie's marriage to Carol is called off by the absent bride.

title: Episode #2.13
description: Tim refuses to believe that Corinne's baby is really his; Burt lies to Mary about who he spent that wayward night with; Elaine escapes from her kidnappers, dying in her husband's arms.

title: Episode #2.14
description: Burt tries to end his relationship with Sally; Eunice and Dutch have visitors at the farmhouse; Detective Donohue reports Chester's death, unaware that he's now a stranded hobo, still suffering from amnesia.

title: Episode #2.15
description: Sally reveals to Mary that she's the one who's been sleeping with Burt, and that he's now cheating on them both; Jodie journeys to Texas to visit Carol, assuring her that he has no intention of being a negligent father.

title: Episode #2.16
description: The police catch up with Dutch; Tim decides to make his peace with God by going off to live in a cave; Jodie meets a suicidal girl who reveals that she too is gay (her father's secretary was dating them both); Burt finds a note from Mary, saying that she's left him; despite being pregnant only a few weeks, Corinne suddenly goes into labor.

title: Episode #2.17
description: Corinne gives birth to a gorgeous baby boy; at home in Jodie's apartment, Alice shows herself to be a Jewish mother; Burt vows to prove his innocence to the disbelieving Mary; Chester finally regains his memory, heading home to his 'loving wife named Jessica, and a fine young son named Benson.'

title: Episode #2.18
description: Burt discovers that Sally lied to Mary about everything because she was being blackmailed by Ingrid Svenson, Corinne's vengeful natural mother; Jessica finally sleeps with Detective Donohue, only to return home to find her supposedly dead husband at the front door.

title: Episode #2.19
description: Sally reveals her lies to a relieved Mary, and the porno film that proves how she was being blackmailed; Chester again shows amusement at the thought of his wife having an affair; Billy falls for a member of a religious cult called The Sunnies; and strange sounds emanate from the nursery of Corinne's baby.

title: Episode #2.20
description: Corinne visits Tim in his cave to convince him to make his peace with God by saving his possessed son; Danny's quest to find the kidnappers who murdered his wife result in Burt spotting a flying saucer that no one else sees.

title: Episode #2.21
description: No one believes Burt has seen a flying saucer; Benson worries that Billy is spending too much time with The Sunnies; Jodie and Alice become jealous about their respective dates, compromising by dating each other.

title: Episode #2.22
description: Jessica drives The Devil out of her grandson, but cannot choose between Chester and Detective Donohue; Danny is captured by his wife's kidnapper, whose girlfriend Millie takes a shine to him; Billy finds himself a prisoner of The Sunnies; and Burt returns to the same place where he saw the flying saucer, vanishing in a flash of light.

title: Episode #3.1
description: Burt finds himself captive on an alien spaceship, with a duplicate of him ready to take his place in Mary's bed; Carol's mother arrives with his newborn daughter Wendy; Jessica chooses Chester over Detective Donohue.

title: Episode #3.2
description: Mary exults about Burt's sudden resurgence in bed, unaware that he's an alien duplicate of her husband; since Wendy's mother abandoned her baby to run off with a cowboy, Jodie finds himself taking sole care of his daughter so long as his best friend Alice is out of the picture; Burt meets another captive on the spaceship, a 4000 year old Jew named Saul.

title: Episode #3.3
description: Billy is rescued from The Sunnies, after which Benson bids farewell to Jessica to work in the mansion of her cousin the Governor; Burt and Saul try to make their escape, while Mary begins to suspect that her Burt is not a different man but another man.

title: Episode #3.4
description: Jessica convinces Detective Donohue to leave; Chester falls into old habits with an old flame; Danny is rescued by Millie, the girlfriend of his wife's killer; and Billy's divorced teacher, Mrs. Leslie Walker, enjoys his flattery after confessing her loneliness.

title: Episode #3.5
description: Dutch is finally released from prison; the alien Burt mistakes Millie for stepson Jodie; Saul beams the real Burt back down to the Campbell home, coming face to face with his duplicate.

title: Episode #3.6
description: The alien Burt prevents Mary from seeing the real Burt; Eunice admits that she can't stand Dutch; Billy takes Leslie to an out-of-the-way place where they must avoid being seen by Chester and Eunice; and the mismatched Tim and Corinne agree to divorce.

title: Episode #3.7
description: Billy spends his first evening in Leslie's apartment, meeting her condescending first husband; the real Burt is beamed back to the ship right in front of Mary, who concludes that he really can make himself invisible.

title: Episode #3.8
description: Billy tries taking Leslie to a hotel, where apparently every member of his family plans to spend the evening; the two Burts meet for a final confrontation.

title: Episode #3.9
description: Billy tells his mother about Leslie; Burt reveals everything about his alien double to Mary; while visiting his wife's grave, Danny meets Polly, a pretty black widow.

title: Episode #3.10
description: Burt laments that Danny has fallen for a black widow; Jessica walks out on her cheating husband; Jodie gets a surprise visit from a social worker.

title: Episode #3.11
description: Chester begs Jessica for another chance; Jodie decides to move back home with his daughter Wendy; Leslie plans a surprise gift for Billy's 18th birthday.

title: Episode #3.12
description: Danny catches up with Polly; Chester and Jessica attend a counseling session with a minister; Burt's doctor reveals that Mary is pregnant, and that Burt's insomnia is caused by a fatal blood disease.

title: Episode #3.13
description: Mary's joyful pregnancy is tempered by the fear that it may turn out to be the child of alien Burt; after spending the night in bed with Leslie, the once virginal Billy admits he's finally found something better than television.

title: Episode #3.14
description: The Campbells receive a visit from Polly's family; Danny learns about Burt's illness, and suggests he leave his legacy by getting into the Guinness Book of World Records; Chester has fallen for the minister's daughter, so Jessica finally kicks him out of the house.

title: Episode #3.15
description: Burt cannot bring himself to tell Mary about his terminal illness; Jessica learns that her old flame Detective Donohue has married someone else.

title: Episode #3.16
description: Jessica goes to psychiatrist Dr. Alan Posner, who keeps a punching bag in his office; Wendy's mother Carol, who jilted Jodie at the altar, makes an unannounced visit; Burt's doctor reveals he's not really dying after all; and Eunice abandons Dutch.

title: Episode #3.17
description: Danny and Polly decide to buy a house; Corinne and Dutch spend the night together; Carol tells Jodie that she intends to go to court to take her daughter away from him.

title: Episode #3.18
description: Burt decides to run for sheriff; Jodie hires Jessica's attorney E. Ronald Mallu for his custody case; after meeting Jessica's crazy family, Dr. Posner believes he could open an office there.

title: Episode #3.19
description: Danny and Polly find their new neighbors hostile; Billy tries to break it off with a suddenly suicidal Leslie; the Tates welcome new butler Saunders, as Jessica collapses during a dinner party.

title: Episode #3.20
description: Dr. Hill treats Jessica in the hospital; Jodie's custody trial begins; and Burt is elected the new sheriff, if he can only get the old one to resign.

title: Episode #3.21
description: Dr. Hill tells Jessica she only has days or weeks left to live; Chester moves back home in time for Leslie's latest suicide attempt; Dutch and Corinne are startled by the surprise return of Eunice.

title: Episode #3.22
description: Danny proposes marriage to Polly; Sheriff Burt and Deputy Danny are set up for blackmail by mobster Elmore Tibbs; Dutch cannot choose between two sisters; Carol's mother joins her daughter in perjuring herself in court; Leslie now decides to kill Billy; and Jessica's death watch features a surprise visit from Benson.

title: Jessica's Wonderful Life
description: In a recap of season three, Jessica pleads with her guardian angel to allow her to rejoin her family on Earth.

title: Episode #4.2
description: Corinne bids goodbye to her mother; Polly turns down Danny's marriage proposal; Burt refuses to knuckle under to Tibbs; Mary returns home with baby Scott, while Jodie finds that his daughter Wendy has been kidnapped.

title: Episode #4.3
description: Jessica admires Burt's blackmail photos; Eunice and Dutch announce their engagement, as Jessica banishes Chester to the pool house.

title: Episode #4.4
description: Chester meets Annie, Eunice's maid of honor. Dutch and Eunice tie the knot. The x-rated photos of Burt show up in the newspaper. Burt and Mary face the public's outrage, as well as each other's. Annie moves into the pool house with Chester. Jessica announces her plans to go on a private vacation to Malaguay. Jessica frees El Puerco, a Malaguayan revolutionary, who immediately takes her hostage.

title: Episode #4.5
description: Jodie hires private detective Maggie to find his kidnapped daughter; Billy heads off to Malaguay to find his mother; Mary is depressed over the media's treatment of her husband, who plans to infiltrate one of Tibbs' massage parlors for evidence.

title: Episode #4.6
description: Burt and Danny disguise themselves at the massage parlor; Danny recognizes Gwen as one of the girls in the blackmail photos; with Jessica still lost in Malaguay, the Tates have no access to her money.

title: Episode #4.7
description: Jessica convinces El to conduct his revolution from her Connecticut home; Danny promises protection for Gwen; the Tates are still strapped for cash, as Dutch gets fired from a car wash because he didn't know what 'agua' meant.

title: Episode #4.8
description: Learning that Carol is now into rodeo clowns, Jodie and Maggie follow her trail to Albuquerque; Danny persuades Gwen to tone down her clientele while under his protective custody.

title: Episode #4.9
description: Jessica's entourage arrives home safely; Danny and Gwen acknowledge each other's feelings; Jodie and Maggie admit their attraction for one another; Burt's crisis of faith results in the death of his boyhood Bishop.

title: Episode #4.10
description: After Jessica announces that she's now officially divorced from Chester, he announces his engagement to Annie; Jodie and Maggie confirm their relationship; a bullet meant for Gwen hits Danny instead.

roles.char: Carlos Marcello David Rodriguez 'El Puerco' Valdez

title: Episode #4.11
description: Burt vows to make Tibbs pay for his crimes; Jessica makes an unsuccessful attempt to seduce El; and Danny's critical injury requires a kidney from a blood relative.

title: Episode #4.12
description: Jodie and Maggie are taken captive by Minja warriors in Malibu; Burt becomes a hero after finally capturing Tibbs; and Mary reveals that Danny's natural father is Chester.

title: Episode #4.13
description: Chester becomes the vital kidney donor on Danny's behalf; Dutch and Eunice try to spice up their sex life by play acting; believing her sister has betrayed her, Jessica refuses to speak to a despondent Mary, who reveals how their mother arranged scatterbrained Jessica's marriage to embezzler Chester.

title: Episode #4.14
description: Jodie and Maggie are rescued from their dungeon prison, after which she proposes marriage; Jodie visits a psychiatrist who puts him under hypnosis, leaving him an elderly Jew; Chester and Annie celebrate their getting married, but his jealousy over Jessica will not end; Mary reconciles with her forgiving sister, then walks out on her high and mighty husband, telling him she doesn't like him anymore.

title: Episode #4.15
description: No one believes Mary when she insists her baby can fly; lamenting his washed up relationship with wife Eunice, Dutch fondly recalls the days of 'screaming and scratching Corinne'; the Governor offers Burt a run for the Senate; and Danny finds his attractive new stepmother Annie as lonely, and irresistible, as he is.

title: Episode #4.16
description: A despondent Chester wants to kill himself, until he finds his new bride in bed with his son; the syndicate baits a trap for the unsuspecting Burt; El Puerco's enemies kidnap Jessica and put her in front of a firing squad.
